TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed FileTracker extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class contains utility functions to encapsulate launching and logging for the Tracker

MemberSignature.Value: public static string CreateRootingMarkerResponseFile (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] sources);
.method public static hidebysig string CreateRootingMarkerResponseFile(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] sources) cil managed

Docs.param: The set of source files.
Docs.summary: Given a set of source files in the form of ITaskItem, creates a temporary response file containing the rooting marker that corresponds to those sources.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string EnsureFileTrackerOnPath ();
.method public static hidebysig string EnsureFileTrackerOnPath() cil managed

Docs.summary: Prepends the path to the appropriate FileTracker assembly to the PATH environment variable. Used for inproc tracking.
Docs.returns: The old value of the PATH environment variable.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string EnsureFileTrackerOnPath (string rootPath);
.method public static hidebysig string EnsureFileTrackerOnPath(string rootPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The root path for FileTracker.dll. Overrides the toolType if specified.
Docs.summary: Prepends the path to the appropriate FileTracker assembly to the PATH environment variable. Used for inproc tracking, or when the .NET Framework may not be on the PATH.

Docs.param: Full path of the file to test
Docs.summary: Test to see if the specified file is excluded from tracked dependencies

MemberSignature.Value: public static string FindTrackerOnPath ();
.method public static hidebysig string FindTrackerOnPath() cil managed

Docs.summary: Searches %PATH% for the location of Tracker.exe, and returns the first path that matches.Matching full path to Tracker.exe or null if a matching path is not found.

Docs.param: The executable type for the tool being tracked

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StartTrackingContextWithRoot (string intermediateDirectory, string taskName, string rootMarkerResponseFile);
.method public static hidebysig void StartTrackingContextWithRoot(string intermediateDirectory, string taskName, string rootMarkerResponseFile) cil managed

Docs.param: The directory into which to write the tracking log files
The name of the task calling this function, used to determine the names of the tracking log files
The rooting marker in the response file.
Docs.summary: Starts tracking file accesses, using the rooting marker in the response file provided. To automatically generate a response file given a rooting marker, call FileTracker.CreateRootingMarkerResponseFile.
